How To Contact Us

The Dazhong Valve and its subsidiaries has more than 60 branches and offices all over the country, and has offices in Malaysia. Market network all over the country and abroad. After obtaining self-support import and export rights in 2003, it actively explores foreign markets, and some products are exported to Europe, America, South Korea, Vietnam, Malaysia, the United Arab Emirates, Pakistan and other countries or regions. Output value, sales, profits and taxes and other indicators have an average annual growth rate of 30%. The sales prospects in domestic and foreign markets are very promising.
